features: These enchanting Jhumkas feature an intricate filigree design, reminiscent of delicate vines and blossoms. The central pear-shaped emerald simulant is framed by a halo of dazzling simulated diamonds, enhancing its vibrant green hue. The Jhumkas are finished with a delicate cascade of lustrous freshwater pearls, adding a touch of traditional elegance. The design showcases the best of traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a modern, lightweight feel.

description: These Jhumkas blend traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities, making them a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. The use of high-quality simulated diamonds and pearls offers exceptional sparkle and elegance at an accessible price point. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, these earrings are perfect for those who appreciate both style and comfort. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine and durability.
